tag_list: kramp, germany, ireland, jobs, vision, marketing, ideas, future, sports, money, finance
overview:
Christian Kramp is a young, excentric, but innovative man from Germany. Mr Kramp’s likes to design new products, services or to new perform those. He often is thinking like a historian, comparing two or more positions (in economy it might be the customer and the producer). Same way Mr Kramp is interested to satisfy the shareholder of a company he is working for. But he knows to re-engage everyone with its ideas if he is convinced by his own ideas.

A negative characteristic is his passion. He often is following an idea and can not stop to look forward and is often years ahead in his mind while the reality is walking behind.
